collection.title: Very Uncooperative during the pandemic

author.locationName: Mulwala 2647, Corowa Shire, Murray Region, NSW, AU

collection.body:
I have asked for a deferment in loan repayments until i return to work when the government lifts restrictions on the Food Service industry.
You would have thought i asked for their first born son!! They are unable to email the forms i need for whatever problem they are having on their end. I just wanted to get it sorted so it is one less stress for me while I am stuck at home worried about finances.
They think I can afford it on Centrelink, use my superannuation, use any Annual Leave i may have..... Honestly any money i do have i need to be frugal with as i have no idea what is happening in the coming months.
Just steer clear of them. They are not a good or compassionate company to deal with.
Every other company I have dealt with since being stood down has been more than helpful and extremely understanding.
Avoid avoid avoid

collection.title: Excellent service

author.locationName: Ballarat, Central Highlands and Goldfields, VIC, AU

collection.body: Excellent, very satisfied & can't believe how quick I was able to get the money. Really helped me out when I needed it which I greatly appreciate. Would highly recommend to anyone who is looking for a loan.

collection.title: Did not realise how much extra I was getting charged
collection.body: It was great to have approval for the loan quickly when I needed emergency funds for my fathers funeral how it was not until months after when I sat down to calculate how long it would take to pay and realise how much extra I was being charged. It was a shock to me although the money was of assistance at the tome the added expense is not worth it. Paying this off and I will be wise not to borrow from them in the future

collection.title: Thieves
collection.body: They lie to you, they robbed me of thousands of dollars in interest. Thousands in application fees. They take days to approve.  And you dont get you money instantly. Ive found all other providers to be better. avoid at all cost!!!

collection.title: Excellent and perfect!

author.locationName: Brunswick 3058, Moreland, Greater Melbourne (Metropolitan), VIC, AU

collection.body: I had a really good and handy experience with this guys. Web really easy to use and fill up. Thanks for your help, really appreciated. Please keep up with everything

collection.title: Good old fashioned customer service
collection.body: No complaints at all the best customer service I have had in such a long time, well done !! Will recommend to anyone who needs a little extra help along the way.

collection.title: Great
collection.body: The customer service was good no unexpected cost I'm 100 percent satisfied with the service and how quickly I was able to get loan and how quick the money was transferred

collection.title: Great interest rates
collection.body: Great interest rates, compared to other lenders. Been with a couple of lenders, Jacaranda’s rate is be far the best!! Quick and easy to use website, also funds in account straight away.

collection.title: Great service, quick money

author.locationName: Brisbane, South East Queensland, QLD, AU

collection.body: Very quick, easy to manage repayments and great service. Would recommend to anyone wanting a fast loan and can’t bank Jacaranda highly enough. Thanks team and look forward to another loan soon

collection.title: PERFECT
collection.body: Jacaranda loans was easy to deal with as nothing unexpected while i was dealing with them. Great CompanyWithin a couple hours of applying I had the funds in my account! No hiccups. No dramas. Simple and efficient!

collection.title: Wow this is perfect
collection.body:
Yes I am so happy and thankful 
I get help easily and quickly perfect work
I receive the fund with in few minutes after I sign the contract great loan arrangement

collection.title: Too good to be true but it is true!

author.locationName: Box Hill 2765, The Hills Shire, Sydney, NSW, AU

collection.body: Within a couple hours of applying I had the funds in my account! No hiccups. No dramas. Simple and efficient! Excellent staff to go along with their excellent service! Definitely recommended!

collection.title: Excellent
collection.body: Easy and fast  process, very friendly and so helpful the money went straight into my account , I have no problems recommending Jacaranda, online account allows you to see owing and payments made

collection.title: Great service and very easy

author.locationName: Brighton Road 3184, Port Phillip, Greater Melbourne (Inner), VIC, AU

collection.body: Really easy to apply and get funds when required many thanks Jacaranda. From application to having funds in my account was less than 1 business day. Am amazed and very appreciative

collection.title: Really fast
collection.body: I applied for a loan at 6am. By 10am it was approved and by 11am the money was in my account. The application process was one of the easiest and no-nonsense loans i have seen in a very long time. Was very satisfied and even surprised by the final result. I would recommend Jacaranda to others for a loan.

collection.title: Great loans
collection.body: Great personal loan agent. Was very quick with application. Great friendly messages n was great to deal with someone who can under my situation. Have no hesitation to recommend to anyone

collection.title: Excellent
collection.body: Very happy and satisfied with how fast with reply and funds lovely people to help talk to thanks heaps. Very good customer service thank you with all your help approval of loan

collection.title: The most painless and easy process!

author.locationName: Upper Caboolture 4510, Moreton Bay, South East Queensland, QLD, AU

collection.body: Jacaranda Finance make the process so simple and easy guiding you through the process step by step online, not only that but they say they'll usually have a response within 60 mins... Well it blew me away when I received a response not even 20 mins later! Then to top it off, a courtesy message was sent out to let me know to confirm the details asap and so I could get the payment that afternoon rather than having to wait till the next business day.

collection.title: Fast to deal with
collection.body:
My customer service experience was great  
Money was put in bank straight away 
Extremely easy to deal with and fast service 
I am extremely happy with the service I was provided

collection.title: It's so fast and easy was in my account right away.

author.locationName: Deception Bay 4508, Moreton Bay, South East Queensland, QLD, AU

collection.body: The customer service was amazing i didnt experience any extra cost or unexpected issues. I im very satisfied with my loan. It was so fast and easy and in my account in no time at all.
